subtitles:
44263 47583 People once believed
that when someone dies...

47583 50703 a crow carries their soul
to the land of the dead.

51523 54473 But sometimes,
something so bad happens...

54903 58703 that a terrible sadness is carried
with it and the soul can't rest.

60223 62663 Then sometimes,
just sometimes...

63223 67303 the crow can bring that soul back
to put the wrong things right.

120023 123903 Shelly Webster and Eric Draven.
Wedding was tomorrow night.

124423 127383 Who the fuck gets married
on Halloween anyhow?

131983 134653 - Sir, we gotta move her.
- Do it.

134903 137143 All right, guys,
let's do it.

137143 140143 Devil's fuckin' Night.
What's the count so far?

141663 144423 - They're slacking off from last year.
- Three hours to go.

144423 147663 - Maybe they're just slow starters.
- Coming through!

151943 155223 You guys can't come in here
and take her away like this.

155223 158943 There are procedures. You should have
cleared this with me first

159903 162143 - Is this the victim?
- No, it's Amelia Earhart.

162143 164983 - We found her, and you missed it.
- I don't care what her name is.

164983 167833 I didn't give the order to move her.
Jesus, Albrecht.

168083 170733 I can see why they took away
your gold shield.

170983 173903 Yeah, I wasn't a big enough asshole.
Come on. Let's go.
173903 176463 - All right, clear out.

177063 179303 - Shelly?
- Stand back, kid.

181703 184623 - Where's Eric?
- Just don't worry about him.

186123 188273 Tell him to take care
of Sarah.

188523 192523 Look, I will.
You just, uh, lie back. Come on.

201343 203263 - You Sarah?
- Yeah.

204223 207143 Yeah, look. Your sister,
she's gonna be okay.

208143 211263 She's not my sister.
Shelly just takes care of me.
211343 213343 She's my friend.
213663 215263 Her and Eric.
217463 219623 You lied to her about Eric.

221623 224183 And you're lying
to me about Shelly.

224903 227103 She's gonna die,
isn't she?

236983 240023 Now, come on.
Come on. It's okay.
242863 244743 She's gonna be fine.

262863 266493 A building gets torched.
All that is left is ashes.

266743 269623 I used to think that was true
about everything...
269623 273023 families, friends, feelings.

273903 277493 But now I know that sometimes,
if love proves real...

277743 281923 two people who are meant to be together,
nothing can keep them apart.

318583 321223 What are you,
like the night watchman?

342143 344813 You know, what this place
needs is a...
345063 347533 good natural catastrophe.

347783 351813 - Earthquake, tornado, you know.
- No, no, no, no.

352063 354983 Mickey, come on, man. You got to put
the mustard underneath first.
354983 357263 Maybe a flood like in the Bible.
357263 359263 Hey, hey, let me do it.

360303 363933 There we go. All right.
How about some onions?

364183 366623 Come on, man.
Don't cheap out on me.

366623 368543 - Lots of onions.
- All right, here you go.
368543 370223 Hey, all right.
370863 372663 Now we're talkin'.
373303 376353 Hey, it's the Sarah monster.

377863 381343 - How do you steer that on a wet street?
- Pure talent. Hi.

381583 385173 Now, Sarah, she's a genuine hot dogger.
You hungry?

385423 387223 - You buyin'?
- I'm buyin'.

387223 390513 - No onions though, okay?
- No onions?
390863 393823 They make you fart big time.

400023 402703 You know, Lake Erie
actually caught on fire once...

402703 405423 from all the crap
floating around in it.
406383 409263 I wish I could have seen that.
467783 470263 Fire it up! Yeah!

509623 513133 - All right, we busted their machines!
- Shit!

535343 538713 Oh, oh, shit, guys.
T-bird, cop car, cop car.

545583 548183 Bad people out
on the street tonight.

553863 555783 - Damn it!
- What was that?

555783 558343 - You wait right here.
- Be careful.
558383 561463 Mickey, call it in for me!

651623 654703 - Eric?
- Department of Housing!

654963 658213 Code violations?
Safety hazards?
659063 661063 Place looks fine to me.
661263 663023 Let's redecorate.
666923 669773 "Abash, the devil stood...
670023 672383 and felt how awful goodness is.

673063 677673 Saw virtue in her shape, how lovely."
It's pornography.
690063 691983 No, no, no, me first.

738543 741343 - Hey, that's good.
- That's good.

745063 748063 See if you can top that, man.
Can you top that?

748583 750783 Look at that.
Look at that.

751743 755373 Here's to Devil's Night,
my new favorite holiday.

759463 761503 You go over there
and talk to your pals--
762403 764713 You sick fuck.

764503 768083 Are you out of
your motherfuckin' mind, man?
773543 775143 Look at that!
776903 778943 Pussies drink last, man.

780063 782713 - Fuck you, Tin Tin.
- Hey.
784303 786543 Shit ain't even loaded, man.
786863 788423 This one is.

788943 791573 Which of you Motor City
motherfuckers...
791823 794183 wants to bet me this one isn't?

796063 799613 Hey, fire it up!
Fire it up!

799863 802663 - Fire it up!
- Fire it up!
- Fire it up!
802903 805403 Fire it up! Fire it up!
806663 808413 Here's your shooters.

808663 810703 - Put your guns away, huh, guys?
- How ya doin'?

844503 847693 - I love you.
- Say that again.
853303 855383 Restaurant.

861063 864263 - Wow, you look great.
- Ta-da!

870903 873583 - Come here!
- No, no, no!

967503 969823 Couple more rings.
That's 24k.

969983 973613 24k, huh? It's 18k.
It's crap. It's probably fake.
973863 975863 Leather purse. Leather.
976783 980333 Geez. Oh, what is this, Tin Tin?
980583 982863 A blood stain that's on here?

985063 987663 I'll give you 50 bucks.
And I hate charities.

987663 989983 Now, you,
take it or leave it.
990723 992563 Right there for ya.
994443 996363 Decisions, decisions.
998823 1001943 You cheap ass, chrome dome...

1001943 1004693 ...child molestin',
saprophyte motherfucker.

1004943 1006513 Close the gate
when you go out!

1006763 1009653 Oh, I close this up
for you real good, massa.

1013083 1015883 Yeah, sit on it and twirl,
you dirty scum.

1020183 1022623 Lucky I didn't stab
your fat ass.

1124743 1127983 What the fuck you all painted
up for, crackhead, huh?
1131903 1134453 Halloween ain't till manana.
1175023 1177713 Fuck, you murderer!

1178343 1180943 I ain't murdered nobody, man!
I don't even fucking know you!

1180943 1184783 - Man, what the fuck you want, man?
- I want you to tell me a story.

1184943 1187623 A man and a woman
in a loft a year ago.

1188343 1190823 - You're out of your fucking mind--
- Listen!

1190823 1195333 I'm sure you'll remember.
You killed them... on Halloween.

1195583 1199943 Yeah, yeah, Halloween, yeah.
Some dude, some bitch, whatever, man.
1200383 1202783 Her name was Shelly.

1202783 1204983 You cut her.
You raped her.

1205783 1210703 Shelly, yeah, yeah. I shanked
her pink ass and she loved it!

1220183 1224733 Murderer? Murderer? Let me tell you
about murder. It's fun!

1224983 1229403 It's easy.
You gonna learn all about it.

1233903 1236813 I'd like you to meet
two buddies of mine.
1237663 1239303 We never miss.

1249403 1251323 - Try again!
- Aaah!

1257183 1260723 Victims.
Aren't we all?

1284383 1288713 - Look at this mess!
What's the world comin' to?
- It's a mess.

1295623 1298343 I got to go upstairs.
Report from the front.

1302783 1305063 Get out of my way,
you worms!

1307023 1309423 Give me some of that
over there!

1311063 1314163 Why don't you ladies come by later?
Check me out.

1314663 1319093 Hey, guess what?
Arcade Games fell down, went boom.

1319343 1322773 - Boom.
- Can you imagine that? It's tragic.

1323023 1327393 Gather your soldiers.
You're on for tomorrow night. No sweat.

1327643 1330453 - Is the man in?
- He's taking a meeting.

1359823 1362183 You're thinking
about the past.
1365703 1367463 Dad gave me this.
1368183 1369863 Fifth birthday.

1372263 1376213 He said childhood's over
the moment you know you're gonna die.
1389663 1391453 Is she asleep?
1398343 1400263 I think we broke her.
1405343 1407063 I love her eyes.
1448763 1451173 I told you to stay out of here.

1451423 1455023 So I guess you're not gonna be home
till a lot later, huh, Darla?

1455023 1458733 She's busy. Go play with your dolls
or something, okay?
1458983 1460983 I don't have any dolls.
1463303 1465143 Get some food, huh?

1464583 1467543 Somebody already bought me dinner.
The police.

1472863 1476703 "Somebody already bought me dinner.
The police."
1486023 1487983 Thirty, forty dollars.
1490823 1492903 Who the fuck is this now?

1493263 1497013 Hey! Piss off!
We're closed!

1499943 1503943 Sleep it off somewhere else, dusthead,
unless you want to get mutilated.

1510903 1514433 Goddamn creatures of the night,
they never learn.

1522343 1526333 "Suddenly I heard
a tapping, as if someone...

1526583 1529853 gently rapping,
rapping at my chamber door."
1532223 1534383 What are you talking about?
1534543 1536743 You heard me rapping, right?

1537183 1540913 You're trespassing,
and you owe me a fuckin' new door!

1543463 1546383 I'm looking for something
in an engagement ring.

1547823 1550783 You're looking for a coroner,
shit-for-brains.

1554143 1556263 Oh, shit.
Oh, shit on me!

1559103 1561143 Shit on me.
Shit on me!
1569663 1571863 You're not paying attention.

1577783 1581973 I repeat, a gold
engagement ring, yes?

1583463 1587263 It was pawned here a year ago
by a customer of yours named Tin Tin.

1589683 1592893 He confided in me
before he ran out of breath.
1597943 1599983 Who's this sack of shit?

1599983 1602863 That's Tin Tin, one of
T-bird's little helpers.

1602863 1605663 I think you can rule out
accidental death.

1605863 1608623 Don't any of your street demons
have real grown-up names?

1608623 1612623 This could be a turf hit, but it doesn't
look like your usual gang crap.

1612703 1617013 Come on, Albrecht, spare me.
You're a beat cop now, so be a beat cop.

1617263 1619183 I'm suppose to thank you
for that, right?

1619183 1622873 Word to the wise:
Watch your fuckin' mouth.

1623983 1626343 What the hell
do you call that?
1628303 1630463 I call it blood, detective.

1629863 1633223 I suppose you'll write it up
as graffiti.

1633583 1636263 You can leave
my crime scene now, okay?

1643663 1644753 - Warmer?
- What are you doing?

1645003 1647853 - Don't you know this game?
- What game are you talkin' about?

1648103 1650983 Okay, the rings!
I'll tell you about the rings!

1650983 1654263 They're in that metal box!
It's under the shelf there!

1655263 1660803 Take the fucking rings!
Choke on them, you son of a bitch!

1664023 1666623 - Look, it goes to the attic.
- Okay.

1682663 1686043 Oh, it's beautiful.
I don't believe it.

1709583 1712463 - You have one chance to live.
- Take anything you want.

1712463 1714743 - Thank you.
- Take anything!

1716603 1718693 Now you're going to tell me
where to find...

1718943 1720393 the rest of Tin Tin's
little party pals.

1720643 1722963 The Pit. They all
hang out at The Pit.

1723263 1727343 T-birds's little potato-heads hang out
there. Funboy lives there upstairs.

1728223 1731273 - Funboy.
- Oh, baby, oh.

1731923 1734363 - A whole jolly club...
- Please!

1734903 1737583 - with jolly pirate nicknames!
- Stop! Please!

1737583 1740383 - Jesus Christ in a taxicab!
- Hold still!
1741783 1744413 Each one of these is a life...
1745103 1747223 a life you helped destroy.

1747943 1750303 I'm begging you.
Don't kill me.
1751143 1753143 I'm not gonna kill you.

1753743 1757823 Your job will be to tell the rest
of them that death is coming for them...

1766063 1769183 Tell them Eric Draven
sends his regards.

1771863 1775223 You walk outta here,
they're gonna erase your sorry ass.

1775823 1779133 You're nothing but street grease,
you motherfucker!
1779383 1781463 Is that gasoline I smell?

1802823 1805543 It's on the house, kiddo,
you know that.
1806223 1807863 One root beer.
1810343 1812783 I can't do anything.

1812983 1816653 Your mom... technically,
she's off right now.

1823823 1827663 Police! Don't move!
I said, "Don't move!"

1828623 1831543 I thought the police
always said, "Freeze!"

1831543 1835383 I am the police and I say don't move,
Snow White. You move, you're dead.

1835883 1839713 And I say I'm dead
and I move.

1840723 1843453 Not one more step.
I'm serious.

1843703 1847693 Then shoot, if you will,
Officer Albrecht.

1847943 1850623 What are you, nuts?
Walking into a gun?

1852943 1855573 - You don't remember me?
- What are you talking about?

1855923 1859493 How about Shelly?
Do you remember Shelly Webster?
1859743 1862143 Shelly Webster's dead, my friend.

1862383 1866453 I want you to move over to the curb,
nice and easy. Come on! Move it!

1868903 1871593 Okay, we're gonna
wait here for backup.

1871843 1875693 - It's gettin' too weird for me.
- Oh, it gets better.
1875943 1878303 Do you know someone named T-bird?

1878303 1882533 He had a friend who shouldn't have
played with knives. Like the coat?

1882783 1885383 You're the guy
that murdered Tin Tin.
1885383 1888463 He was already dead.

1888823 1892823 He died a year ago.
The moment he touched her.

1894123 1897283 They're all dead.
They just don't know it yet.
1897923 1899803 Get away from there!

1899983 1901943 Cops!
Get outta here!

1903063 1906103 Leave it, leave it!
Run!
1911463 1914143 Oh, great, great.

1915703 1918223 Guy shows up looking like
a mime from hell...

1918223 1920543 and you lose him
right out in the open.

1920543 1925853 Well, at least he didn't do that walking
against the wind shit. I hate that.
1926263 1928623 Little early for Devil's Night.
1931503 1933463 You are very restless.

1934223 1937343 Just wish I was a little
hungry again, that's all.

1937383 1941023 - Be careful of what you ask for.
- Yeah, I may get it, I know.

1952463 1955183 There are energies
aligning against you.
1955383 1957703 Seeing is believing, isn't it?

1976183 1979423 Gideon's pawnshop just burned down
to the foundation.

1980023 1982433 Nobody cleared this
little event with me.

1982683 1983933 I didn't have nothing
to do with that.
1984583 1986733 You must be awfully disappointed.

1986983 1990143 I got trouble.
One of my crew got himself perished.

1990863 1993103 - Yeah, who might that be?
- Tin Tin.

1993103 1997103 Somebody stuck his blades in all his
major organs in alphabetical order.

1997583 2000063 Gentlemen, by all means,
I think we ought to have...

2000063 2003463 an introspective moment of silence
for poor, old Tin Tin.

2005703 2008263 You're working for me
tomorrow night, right?

2008263 2010863 - Whatever you say, I can do.
- Good.
2011023 2013023 That's very reassuring.

2013783 2016703 I still ain't heard
why Gideon's burned down.

2017663 2021563 Is that a natural catastrophe
or act of God or something?
2022023 2024263 Call it my need to know.
2056023 2057823 Let go, you creep!

2063463 2066183 You didn't even slow down,
you dickhead!
2067983 2070063 He couldn't have stopped.

2070343 2073063 He was a buttface.
I could have made it.

2074543 2077583 What are you supposed to be,
a clown or something?

2081423 2085543 It's more like surfing than skating.
I wish the rain would stop, just once.

2087143 2089743 - It can't rain all the time.
- Eric?

2106743 2110933 Don't thank me.
Are we fighting the good fight?

2111183 2114673 Double homicide a year ago.
No convictions.

2115423 2117733 Annie...
Look at that.

2118823 2123293 "We, the undersigned tenants of
1929 Caulderon Court Apartments--"
2123543 2125033 What is this, a petition?

2124983 2127533 Big "kick me" sign for a very nice girl
who found herself a cause.

2127783 2131743 - The cause got her killed.
- She was fighting tenant eviction
in that neighborhood?

2131743 2136013 Shelly Webster and her nice
rock-and-roll boyfriend, Eric Draven.

2137503 2140983 The last time you snooped around a case
is when you got put back on the beat.

2140983 2144873 - I know. Torres keeps reminding me.
- I bet he does.

2151943 2155103 You're going to wind up
working a school crosswalk.

2157303 2161343 You didn't get that file from me, okay?
And don't tell me you owe me one.
2162543 2164133 Ah, I owe you one!

2192903 2196373 Tomorrow night
we can get high...

2196623 2199983 and watch this whole fucking city
burn from that window.
2224063 2226663 There's a big fuckin' bird over there.
2232863 2234583 Come here, bird.

2235463 2237423 Hey, bird.
Hey, bird.
2237583 2239343 Bird. B-B-Birdie.
2239823 2241743 Here, birdie, birdie.

2242023 2244503 Come here, birdie,
birdie, birdie.
2247383 2249263 Birdie? Hey, birdie?
2255303 2256943 What the fuck?

2263303 2267063 No, man! Don't do that! You nearly
gave me a fucking heart attack!
2269863 2271983 Don't sweat it.

2274263 2277543 It's time for you to take
your bird and leave, freako.

2285303 2288973 Take your shot, Funboy.
You got me dead bang.

2291563 2296513 You are seriously fucked up.
Did you look in the mirror?
2296763 2298923 You need professional help.

2303743 2305663 He shoots!
He scores!

2315983 2320073 - Jesus Christ!
- Jesus Christ?
2320323 2322553 Stop me if you heard this one.

2322803 2325203 Jesus Christ
walks into a hotel.

2330343 2333313 He hands the innkeeper
three nails and he asks...
2333563 2336423 Don't you ever fuckin' die?
2336543 2338743 "Can you put me up for the night?"

2343943 2347263 - Does that hurt?
- Fuck. Does it-- Fuck, does it hurt?
2350503 2354323 Look what you've done to my sheets.
2377663 2379903 I've got a gun in my pocket.

2382463 2384983 You're happy to see me,
aren't you?

2402103 2405133 Stay away!
Stay away from me!

2417063 2420823 Mother is the name for God
on the lips and hearts of all children.
2421423 2424263 Do you understand?
2423703 2426103 Morphine is bad for you.

2437183 2440623 Your daughter is out there
on the streets waiting for you.

2471383 2473063 If I wanted ice,
I would have asked for ice!
2473043 2474723 Now fill it up!
2476883 2479203 Fill it up yourself, macho man.
2479223 2481063 I really need this.

2491763 2494143 You burn yourself
playing with matches?

2494103 2496663 - Fuck off.
- You have an appointment.

2496463 2498823 - Well, shit on me.
- Drink up.

2498943 2501703 This is a first.
Do I bow or do I curtsy?
2501823 2504383 Get my friend here a glass of blood.
2506463 2509213 Hey, good night, Darla.
2513023 2515823 You stay put right there.
2524303 2526983 Get away, steamhead.

2557503 2561663 As you can see, I'm on the corner
of 27th and Washington...

2563103 2565743 the site of last year's biggest
Devil's Night conflagration.

2565743 2568703 It was exactly one year ago
that the building you see...

2568703 2571583 across the street from me
was totally demolished by fire.

2571583 2573583 The fire that was fought
by seven fire companies...

2573703 2575863 but lost the lives
of two fire fighters.

2575863 2579943 In fact, if it weren't for the constant
surveillance by the local police--
2583383 2585703 Jesus. Don't ever do that, man.
2591243 2592883 Good likeness.

2592743 2596043 I saw your body, man.
You died. You got buried.
2596343 2598953 You still have your hat on.
2602263 2604023 I gotta sit down.
2613743 2617693 are you some kind of... ghost?

2627063 2630823 I don't know what I am. I need you
to tell me what happened to us.

2633343 2636343 You took a six-story swan dive
out of a window.
2637343 2640093 She, ah, was beaten and raped.

2640343 2644613 Died at the hospital.
Hey, you asked, man.
2644863 2646863 Come on. Read the file.

2647463 2651493 Shelly Webster held on
for 30 hours in intensive care.
2651743 2654143 Her body finally just gave it up.

2654863 2657463 I saw it.
I couldn't do jack for her.

2668063 2669983 - Hey.
- Don't touch me!
2682063 2684303 I saw her through your eyes.
2685343 2687383 You stayed with her the whole time.

2687383 2691353 Yeah, well, you got to
understand something, all right?

2692703 2696683 I was hoping she'd come
out of it, you know.
2697303 2699863 Give me something I could work with.
2704823 2707263 Why didn't you do something about it?

2707263 2710543 You think any people in that building,
even the ones who signed the petition...
2710543 2713183 would talk after what happened to you?
2713903 2716223 I kept asking questions and...

2717063 2720703 finally got busted for sticking
my nose where it wasn't wanted.
2723463 2725143 This your wife?

2725423 2729513 Yeah, we, uh-- Well, not anymore,
we're getting a divorce.

2734423 2737343 Little things used to mean
so much to Shelly.

2738303 2741103 I used to think
they were kind of trivial.

2741343 2743703 Believe me,
nothing is trivial.

2753903 2756983 You shouldn't smoke these.
They'll kill you.

2763163 2765883 You going to vanish
into thin air again?
2769183 2771663 I thought I'd use your front door.

2774743 2780223 Look, man, I'm sorry as hell for what
happened to you and your girlfriend.

2790943 2794143 I got stabbed!
I shot the son of a bitch!

2794383 2797183 I watched the bullet hole
close by itself.

2797503 2800423 And then my business
gets blown up real good.

2800463 2803223 - Other than that, my day sucked.
- Yeah.

2803663 2806023 I saw him too.
He had a guitar.

2806143 2810343 He winked at me before he jumped out
a fourth-floor window like he had wings.

2810423 2813823 He winked at ya?
Musicians.

2815383 2817823 - What else did you see?
- So far I haven't heard...

2817823 2820263 shit about what you're going to do
about all this crap!

2820263 2824193 What do I get? My livelihood
got flushed and went swirling.
2825663 2827783 You ain't lost everything.

2828383 2832643 Yeah, and maybe you're not
such a big shot either! Ow! Jesus!
2833343 2835333 Fair enough.

2840183 2842623 Say hello to the last fellow
who wouldn't cooperate with me.

2842623 2844583 What're you tellin' me,
this thing is real?

2844583 2847863 All the power in the world
resides in the eyes, fella.

2848183 2851703 Sometimes they're more useful
than the people who bear them.

2852023 2855383 You're directly out of
your fucking mind! You know that!

2858703 2863693 Eyes see. It's one of the most important
things I learned from my sister.

2863843 2867043 Sister? She's supposed to be
your sister?

2866943 2869463 My father's daughter.
That's right.

2870223 2873303 What's the matter,
you don't see the resemblance?

2873343 2875583 Now, let's take it
from the top, friend.

2875583 2878223 With a lot of detail.
What do you say?

2879023 2882143 He had a bird with him.
Nearly pecked my face off.

2882423 2885623 He told me to tell T-bird
that death was on its way.
2885743 2887983 Whatever the fuck that means.

2888323 2891583 Draven. He said his name
was Eric Draven.
2892623 2894743 Want to relax that thing now?

2894743 2897983 This bird man, he just happened
to let you live, huh?

2899263 2903293 You sure you ain't making all this up
just to save your own ass?
2903543 2905703 I ain't makin' all this up.
2906183 2908953 I ain't twisted like you two fucks.

2918743 2922963 A boy and his bird.
Awful touching.

2933343 2936463 For fuck's sake, die, will ya?
Give me that thing.

2945143 2947463 Funboy said he saw
a black bird too.

2950023 2952783 Then he choked to death
on his own blood.
2954003 2957093 I'll have the janitor come on up.
3020023 3021863 You lost or hungry?
3027263 3029183 " It can't rain all the time "
3029183 3031903 " Can't rain all the time "

3042223 3044863 I don't know how many times
I gotta tell you. We're in this together!
3044863 3047103 One part falls, it all falls!
